page.title: 11POST AND TELEPHONE SERVICES
page.content: Although the Callington telephone exchange is in the town its name is now{Liskeard}and the STD code {0579.} Harrowbarrow telephones have also lost their local identity of{St.Doninic } for Liskeard. There is a public call box in Harrowbarrow village. { }The{postal sorting office}for the area is at Callington, manned by part time sorters. Except for the 5a.m. collection, from which local mail is extracted for the morning's delivery, all mail now goes to{Plymouth}for sorting and franking. Post boxes are emptied twice daily by the team of twelve postmen,who make deliveries once a day,on foot in Callington, elsewhere by van. The postal code is PL17. {Short wave aerials}on Kit Hill provide telecommunications for public utilities.
